caption.p: Results of surface topography on mono- and multi-frequency vibration conditions: ( a) simulation results of surface topography on mono-frequency vibration condition (∆ = 5, ε = 0.2); ( b) simulation results of surface topography on mono-frequency vibration condition (∆ = 2, ε = −0.2); ( c) experimental results on the mono-frequency vibration condition; ( d, e) experimental results on the multi-frequency vibration condition. Reproduced with permission from [ 75, 76, 79].
